sentence.Network_en: A government uses a cryptogram or secret code.
In this thesis, the basic concepts of cryptogram including number theory and modular arithmetic are introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍了密码学的基本概念,包括数论的基础知识和模运算的概念.

sentence.Network_en: Lastly, the mixed cryptogram arithmetic was implemented and applied into the application of email encryption.
sentence.Network_cn: 最后, 实现了混合加密算法,并将其应用于加密发送电子邮件中.

means.word_mean: 1. a piece of writing in code or cipher

auth_sentence.content: The parchment is covered with invisible ink, which, as Legrand discovers, conceals a cryptogram.
auth_sentence.res_content: The parchment is covered with invisible ink, which, as Legrand discovers, conceals a cryptogram.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The parchment is covered with invisible ink, which, as Legrand discovers, conceals a cryptogram.

auth_sentence.content: When he published a cryptogram that he had devised, he was astonished that even a single reader wrote in with the solution.

stems_affixes.word_buile: apocrypha[n.伪经,伪书]+al……的→adj.伪经的,假冒的
crypt秘密,隐藏+ic……的→adj.秘密的,神秘的
apo离开+crypha=crypt神秘,神圣→离开神圣→伪经
crypto=crypt秘密,隐藏+gram图,码,字→秘密字→密码
crypt秘密,隐藏+onym名字→n.匿名,假名
de去掉+crypt秘密,隐藏→v.译[电文], 解释明白
en使……进入+crypt秘密,隐藏→将……加密
epigram[n.警句,格言]+atic表形容词→epigrammatic警句的
dia对着,交叉+gram写,图→交叉对着画→图表
epi在……上+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
gramo=gram写,图+phone电话机→写下声音的电话机→留声机
pro前+gram写,图→在前面写好→计划,大纲
